name: After Party (Pro): Search Of Hidden Crime Clue
name_original: After Party (Pro): Search Of Hidden Crime Clue
description:
Pay once, play forever! No.1 Game World Wide!

Silver-screen star Veronica West plummeted to her death from the top of a lighthouse on Silvermoon Isle. Was it an accident? A suicide? Or did someone at the party that night kill Veronica?

• SOLVE A CLASSIC WHODUNIT WITH AN INTERACTIVE TWIST! Veronica West was having her birthday party on a secluded island when things took a horrifying turn as she died falling from the top of a lighthouse.

• HOW DID VERONICA WEST DIE? You are called in to investigate the case—all the suspects are still on the island, and there is a huge mansion to be combed through for clues!

• SCOUR THE ISLAND FOR CLUES TO CRACK THIS INTRIGUING CASE! Use your seasoned deductive skills to interrogate suspects, examine scenes for evidence, and solve intriguing puzzles and mini-games!
